job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

jd: Hi,Hope you are doing great!!!Job Description -Role: AWS Cloud Database EngineerLocation: San Antonio, TX or Irvine, CA – Hybrid ( need locals ) LinkedIn needed resume should not be more than 4 pages aws, sql and terrform are must have skills They are looking for non indian candidate only • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. • 12+ years of Proven experience as a Database Engineer or similar role with a strong focus on cloud environments. • Expertise in SQL Server, Always On clusters, and secondary databases (Oracle, PostgreSQL) with automation skills (Python, Terraform). • Extensive knowledge of database technologies, especially Postgres, and familiarity with AWS cloud services. • Proficient in using IAM, EC2, RDS, S3, and observability tools like Splunk and Datadog. • Strong programming skills in Python and experience with Terraform. • Experience working in an Agile environment. • Excellent problem-solving abilities and strong communication skills. • Optional: Experience with Oracle and SQL Server is a plus. Responsibilities: • Design, deploy, and manage highly available and scalable database solutions on AWS platforms. • Implement and maintain IAM policies and security measures to protect database environments. • Utilize AWS services such as EC2, RDS, and S3 to optimize database performance and ensure robust disaster recovery and high availability strategies. • Monitor database systems with tools like Splunk and Datadog to ensure operational health and performance. • Write and maintain scripts in Python to automate routine DB platform operations. • Develop and apply infrastructure as code (IaC) practices using Terraform to manage cloud resources efficiently. • Conduct performance tuning of database systems to meet the specific requirements of our applications.
